attributes.action: parliament demand police chiefs stop denigrating the office of constable
attributes.additional_details:

 this is against police regulations on nail decorations
https://twitter.com/swpcardiff/status/921303844667232256
 
 policing is done with consent,most people do not consent to this
attributes.background:
Recently police chiefs have opened themselves,their forces their officers and the office of constable to ridicule by engaging in publicity stunts on social media.
 They should not be using social media for such purposes

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
